name: IN 8 MINUTES GOD WILL TURN THIS PLACE TO GLASS
name_original: IN 8 MINUTES GOD WILL TURN THIS PLACE TO GLASS
description:
IN 8 MINUTES GOD WILL TURN THIS PLACE TO GLASS

A game about huge shadows moving across the earth, crackling flames and evil that cannot possibly be stopped.

Made by Tuilelaith Doherty ( @translulaith ) for the Ludum Dare 33 Game Jam

Fire SFX courtesy of http://www.freesfx.co.uk

Thanks for playing!
